Name: Earth is too small for me
About the game: Story There used to be a man called the strongest. He defeated all the villains with one blow. His descendants were naturally the strongest. Then 2000 years passed. His descendant had been given his own star by the Earth Federation Government... About Game A 3D third person shooter. A game for a single player only. It is a game in which the main character, “Strongest Legend, ” is manipulated to defeat the enemy and head for the destination of the dungeon. Dungeons have multiple hierarchies. The destination of each dungeon is displayed on a marker on the screen. When the key in the dungeon is obtained, the door of the dungeon can be opened. The destination of each dungeon can be reached to the next level. Game Tips The opening cutscene can be skipped with the ESC key. The main character is operated by a mouse and a keyboard. You can break the containers in the dungeon. If you walk on the recovery item, your HP will recover. The game is autosaved at the start of each level. Hold the gun with the right mouse button and attack with the left mouse button. If you have the ally member, she automatically follows you. When the ally member finds an enemy, she starts attacking automatically. Options can be changed from the main menu. Potion. Recover HP. Stamina potion. Recover stamina. Controls Move: W A S D Strongest shock wave: E Run: Shift key Hold the weapon: Right click Attack: Left click Reload: R Pause Screen: ESC key
